description: Trap sent when an accelerator is added to the cluster.
The MAC address of the iSD/switch emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceMACAddress

description: Trap sent when an accelerator is removed from the cluster.
The MAC address of the iSD/switch emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceMACAddress

description: Trap sent when an extra accelerator is detected in the
cluster. This trap contains the MAC address of the extra
accelerator.

event.Summary: Detected extra accelerator $v1 in the cluster

description: The MAC address of the iSD/switch emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceMACAddress

description: Trap sent when a connection has been established with the
accelerator. This trap contains the MAC address of the
accelerator.
The MAC address of the iSD/switch emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceMACAddress

description: Informative trap sent conveying that the configuration
update request is successfully completed. This trap sends
the IP address and MAC address of the device whose update
succeeded.

event.Summary: Successfully completed the configuration update for $v2

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALTEON-ASF-MIB::asfConfigUpdateSuccess ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceMACAddress s EXAMPL

description: The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: The MAC address of the iSD/switch emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceMACAddress

description: Informative trap sent conveying that the configuration
update request failed. This trap sends the IP address and
MAC address of the device whose update failed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALTEON-ASF-MIB::asfConfigUpdateFail ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceMACAddress s EXAMPL

description: The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: The MAC address of the iSD/switch emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceMACAddress

description: Trap sent when the firewall has started running. This trap
contains the IP address of relevant iSD.
The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: Trap sent when the firewall on one of the iSDs in the
cluster is stopped. This trap contains the IP address of
the affected iSD.
The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: Trap sent when webserver is stopped. This trap contains
the IP address of the affected iSD.
The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: Trap sent when webserver is started after failing. This
trap contains the IP address of the affected iSD.
The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: Trap sent when file system usage crosses 75% level. For
example, if level crosses 75% for 1 GB hard disk on iSD
with IP address 123.45.67.89, then a trap is sent when
usage of hard disk is reaches 750 MB. The following
objects will be in the trap: 123.45.67.89, bytes (used),
bytes (available).
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALTEON-ASF-MIB::asfFileSystemWarning ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 ALTEON-ASF-MIB::infoString s EXAMPLE ALTEON-ASF-MIB::memoryUsed u 9999

description: The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: When applicable, a brief description about the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::infoString

description: The amount of disk space or memory consumed by the hard
disk/RAM. This value can be absolute or a percentage
of total (determined by 'memoryUsageType'). If the
memoryUsageType is 'absolute' (1) then the value of this
object is defined by the unit specified by the
memoryUsageUnit.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::memoryUsed

description: Trap sent when file system usage crosses 90% level. For
example, if level crosses 90% for 1 GB hard disk on iSD
with IP address 123.45.67.89, then a trap is sent
when usage of hard disk reaches 900 MB. The following
objects will be in the trap: 123.45.67.89, bytes (used),
bytes (available).
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ALTEON-ASF-MIB::asfFileSystemCritical ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress a 192.0.2.1 ALTEON-ASF-MIB::infoString s EXAMPLE ALTEON-ASF-MIB::memoryUsed u 9999

description: The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: When applicable, a brief description about the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::infoString

description: The amount of disk space or memory consumed by the hard
disk/RAM. This value can be absolute or a percentage
of total (determined by 'memoryUsageType'). If the
memoryUsageType is 'absolute' (1) then the value of this
object is defined by the unit specified by the
memoryUsageUnit.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::memoryUsed

description: Trap sent when memory usage crosses 75% level. The
following objects will be in the trap: iSD IP address
75% used, % memory available.
The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: The amount of disk space or memory consumed by the hard
disk/RAM. This value can be absolute or a percentage
of total (determined by 'memoryUsageType'). If the
memoryUsageType is 'absolute' (1) then the value of this
object is defined by the unit specified by the
memoryUsageUnit.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::memoryUsed

description: Trap sent when memory usage crosses 90% level. The
following objects will be in the trap: iSD IP address,
90% used, % memory available.
The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress

description: The amount of disk space or memory consumed by the hard
disk/RAM. This value can be absolute or a percentage
of total (determined by 'memoryUsageType'). If the
memoryUsageType is 'absolute' (1) then the value of this
object is defined by the unit specified by the
memoryUsageUnit.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::memoryUsed

description: Trap sent when the iSD's state is down. This trap contains
the IP address of the affected iSD.
The IP address of the iSD/accelerator emitting the
notification.
variables.name: ALTEON-ASF-MIB::deviceIpAddress
